Title: When Extremes Meet
Director: Joaquim Dos Santos, Ki Hyun Ryu
Writer: Bryan Konietzko (creator), Michael Dante DiMartino (creator), Michael Dante DiMartino, Bryan Konietzko
Actors: Janet Varney, David Faustino, P.J. Byrne, J.K. Simmons
Plot: Korra faces off with Councilman Tarrlok as Equalist activity continues to rise in Republic City.
